textBeforeTable: Chitin, Imperial Studded Leather, Imperial Newtscale, Glass Nordic Bearskin, Nordic Fur, Netch Leather, Boiled Netch Leather, Light Cuirass[edit] Light Armor[edit] Note that the Enchant values shown here are as used in-game.
